commit.message:
add jolokia and stats metrics and related classes and methods (#18)

* setup docker and build image gh action

* add build.sh

* update build.sh

* comment out impala and other hooks based on atlas-v2 in pom.xml

* disable ranger for auth - temporary as ranger builds in progress

* disable ranger for auth - temporary as ranger builds in progress

* disable ranger for auth - temporary as ranger builds in progress

* disable ranger for auth - temporary as ranger builds in progress

* disable ranger for auth - temporary as ranger builds in progress

* add back ranger docker config

* update dockerfile

* update enable-atlas-plugin

* update dockerfile

* change zookeeper version

* update auth and other changes from atlas-v2

* add endpoints in adminresource

* fix class ref issues

* fix class ref issues

* update ranger plugins

* update ranger plugins

* updates to ranger scripts

* change slf4j version

* change hadopp version

* add slf4j simple in pom

* try workaround mentioned here: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/RANGER-2478

* change slf4j ranger version to 1.7.25

* change hadoop jars

* revert back the jars and htrace

* change commons lang3 version

* remove comms-lang3

* add ranger creds jar

* disable presto config

* build atlas with no auth

* build atlas with no auth

* Remove env change to test atlas without ranger

* remove netty dependency:

* remove log4j2 conf from docker

* rever to 823841e392ff05ddf191c639bdbfd8380a7364bb

* update enable-atlas-plugin

* update ranger configs

* update ranger plugins and docker

* ATLAS-4435: Disable session inactivity timeout.

* remove default unused typedefs

* META-2694 Use UUID in qualifiedName instead of name

* META-2694 remove _ & - from NanoIdUtils

* META-2700 META-2701 Unique Names for Glossary Category Term

* META-2700 META-2701 Fixed error message

* META-2668 Add name attribute in AtlasObjectId

* Meta 2705 (#9)

* ATLAS-4358: Address race condition in AtlasPatchRegistry in HA mode.

* ATLAS-4429:#1:UI: (New UI) Deleting a classification immediately after creating it results in endless loading

Signed-off-by: Pinal Shah <pinal.shah@freestoneinfotech.com>

* ATLAS-4427:#1:UI: (New UI) Refresh button inside advanced DSL search popup box should refresh the types list,fixed

Signed-off-by: Pinal Shah <pinal.shah@freestoneinfotech.com>

* META-2705: NPE while creating entity which attribute of Array of structs

* META-2705 - Addressed Review Comments

Co-authored-by: Ashutosh Mestry <amestry@cloudera.com>
Co-authored-by: prasad pawar <prasad.pawar@freestoneinfotech.com>
Co-authored-by: Varun <bankavarun@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Nixon Rodrigues <nixon@ATMAC097.local>
Co-authored-by: Nixon Rodrigues <nixon@atlan.com>

* META-2707 Basic Search with param termName is not working

* META-2700 META-2701 fixed term update bug

* META-2668 Add name attribute in AtlasObjectId: accept attrs  from request

* META-2668 Add name attribute in AtlasObjectId: accept attrs from request #2

* add jolokia and stats metrics and related classes and methods

* Enhance/text search (#20)

* created esquerybuilder and added in freetextprocessor

* added: multifields support in attributeDefs

* updated gitignore

* Added way to add custom es settings via JSON

* ATLAS-4358: Address race condition in AtlasPatchRegistry in HA mode.

* ATLAS-4429:#1:UI: (New UI) Deleting a classification immediately after creating it results in endless loading

Signed-off-by: Pinal Shah <pinal.shah@freestoneinfotech.com>

* ATLAS-4427:#1:UI: (New UI) Refresh button inside advanced DSL search popup box should refresh the types list,fixed

Signed-off-by: Pinal Shah <pinal.shah@freestoneinfotech.com>

* ATLAS-4421: [Atlas: Hive Import] When import-hive is run with incorrect input the information is not conveyed to the user

Signed-off-by: Sarath Subramanian <sarath@apache.org>

* META-2705: NPE while creating entity which has attribute of Array of structs (#7)

* META-2705: NPE while creating entity which attribute of Array of structs

* META-2705 - Addressed Review Comments

Co-authored-by: Nixon Rodrigues <nixon@ATMAC097.local>

* Revert "META-2705: NPE while creating entity which has attribute of Array of structs (#7)" (#8)

This reverts commit dda3989de96411608a594dee92bf6f2b8ad1556c.

* update pom.xml from master

Co-authored-by: Anshul Mehta <anshul@ATMAC079.local>
Co-authored-by: Ashutosh Mestry <amestry@cloudera.com>
Co-authored-by: prasad pawar <prasad.pawar@freestoneinfotech.com>
Co-authored-by: Varun <bankavarun@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Disha Talreja <dishatalreja@cloudera.com>
Co-authored-by: nixon-atlan <90237172+nixon-atlan@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Nixon Rodrigues <nixon@ATMAC097.local>

* Comment es-settings.json file reading code since its missing in conf so that Atlas comes up gracefully. (#21)

* META-2710 Support Basic search after updating GCT typeDefs to add new attributes

* META-2694 Use UUID in qualifiedName instead of name: remove redundant code

* add jolokia commands to TestMetadata.py

* Update maven.yml

* META-2713 : - policy evaluator api. (#30)

Co-authored-by: Nishant Arora <8947356+nshntarora@users.noreply.github.com>

Co-authored-by: Ashutosh Mestry <amestry@cloudera.com>
